article_title: SUNDAY Q&A: Tyler Foote, Virginia State Director for Americans for Prosperity
article_text:

og.description: Tyler Foote is the new state director of Americans for Prosperity, a conservative advocacy group funded by businessmen brothers David H. Koch and Charles Koch of Koch Industries, the second-largest privately held company in the U.S.
